Text.Page:
We can't get our supplies. No supplies means no food. No food means no energy, and no energy means no chance of fighting off the Gutrends that are attacking us and taking our supplies!

If we could just get some meat.... Maybe you wouldn't mind killing a few {@LinkCreature:6#1021#stomping noruks} so we can use their meat to survive?

Thank you. This should be an interesting experience.

We don't usually eat noruk meat, you see. Extraordinary circumstances, though.
Have you brought the meat back? We don't usually eat noruks, but we're really quite desperate around here.
